meanings.definition: A plant of the mint family with aromatic leaves.
meanings.sent1: I planted some costmaries in my garden for their pleasant smell.
meanings.sent2: The costmaries in the herb garden added a lovely fragrance to the air.
meanings.sent3: The costmaries whispered sweet scents to the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The costmaries danced in the breeze, spreading their aromatic secrets.
meanings.sent5: The costmaries stood tall, their fragrant leaves inviting bees and butterflies.

meanings.definition: The leaves of the costmary plant used for flavoring or medicinal purposes.
meanings.sent1: I added a sprinkle of costmaries to the soup for a hint of flavor.
meanings.sent2: The costmaries gave a unique taste to the dish, making it special.
meanings.sent3: The costmaries played hide and seek in the spice rack, waiting to be chosen.
meanings.sent4: The costmaries were like tiny magicians, transforming the meal with their touch.
meanings.sent5: The costmaries infused the potion with their healing powers, ready to cure any ailment.
